text: Hi validators, is there a way to revoke global pre-approval done on a Validator ? I made it with wallet UI with the button “PRE-APPROVE INCOMING DIRECT TRANSFER OF CANTON COIN”. I want to test on testnet specific and targeted approval with configuration of _`autoAcceptTransfers`_<https://docs.dev.sync.global/validator_operator/validator_helm.html#configuring-sweeps-and-auto-accepts-of-transfer-offers| config>, so I want to revoke before.

elements.text: Hi validators, is there a way to revoke global pre-approval done on a Validator ? I made it with wallet UI with the button “PRE-APPROVE INCOMING DIRECT TRANSFER OF CANTON COIN”. I want to test on testnet specific and targeted approval with configuration of
autoAcceptTransfers
config
, so I want to revoke before.

text:
you would need to do

*DELETE* /v0/admin/transfer-preapprovals/by-party/{receiver-party}

elements.text: you would need to do
DELETE
/v0/admin/transfer-preapprovals/by-party/{receiver-party}

text:
Hi all,
I’m trying to get choices working in our node/ts back end. We are on SDK 3.3-snapshot. I’m creating the contract using submit-and-wait. How do I get the contract id?

The typescript packages for 3.3 aren’t working for me so I haven’t been able stream updates using the updateId and completionOffset returned by submit-and-wait.

  "@daml/ledger": "3.3.0-snapshot.20250409.13730.0.v6972616a",
  "@daml/types": "3.3.0-snapshot.20250409.13730.0.v6972616a",

I also tried the ledger v2 apis but /create is giving me a 404.

Can somebody point me in the right direction?

elements.text:

text:
thanks Aunt. i already saw some different, the gRPC offer way more detail in some endpoint, especially around dar file.

we're already going back to grpc now and will also setup vpn to protect the ledger json REST API.
